name: Soup Brawl
description:
CHICKEN AND TOMATO!

Since THE BEGINNING this two SOUPS were fighting among themselves for rule over HUMANKIND.

The effects of such wars waged in POTHAVEN were vastly seen on HUMAN LANDS, so the SOUPS decided to stop fighting them. BUT the RULE OVER HUMANKIND haveth not been resolved. 'HOW to solve it' THE MIGHTY SOUPS asked, and soon in their SOUP WISDOM They came to THE GREATEST CONCLUSION. 

There will be TOURNAMENT.  A BRAWL if you will in which SOUP CHAMPIONS will decide which SOUP will gain controll.

YOU ARE THE HOSEN SOUP CHAMPION! FIGHT FOR YOUR SOUP AND WIN CONTROL FOR YOUR MASTER!
